title: New: HIRA – Eve
body:
This love song from London’s **HIRA** goes deep.

Calling in Craze & Hoax and A. K. Paul on co-production duties, _Eve_ is as slick as anything I’ve heard this year. This is the future and it sounds awesome.

excerpt.full: This love song from London’s HIRA goes deep. Calling in Craze & Hoax and A. K. Paul on co-production duties, Eve is as slick as anything I’ve heard this year. This is the future and it sounds awesome.
excerpt.short: This love song from London's HIRA goes deep.
